org.regele.totask2.model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.regele.totask2.model.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails

    @Entity
public final class User
extends Object
implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails
    User who can log his work into totask2 application. spring-security: Provides core user information. Implementations are not used directly by Spring Security for security purposes. They simply store user information which is later encapsulated into Authentication objects. This allows non-security related user information (such as email addresses, telephone numbers etc) to be stored in a convenient location.
    Since:
    2015-08-17
    See Also:
    spring security, UserCachingService, UserDetailsServiceImpl, Serialized Form
